helm-values.affinity.description:
A Kubernetes Affinity, if required.
For more information, see [Assigning Pods to Nodes](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/scheduling-eviction/assign-pod-node).

For example:
affinity:
  nodeAffinity:
   requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
     nodeSelectorTerms:
     - matchExpressions:
       - key: foo.bar.com/role
         operator: In
         values:
         - master

helm-values.enable.description: This field can be used as a condition when using it as a dependency. This definition is only here as a placeholder such that it is included in the json schema.

helm-values.fullnameOverride.description: Override the "slackbot-server.fullname" value. This value is used as part of most of the names of the resources created by this Helm chart.

helm-values.llmarinerApiKeySecret.key.description: The key name where the API key is stored.

helm-values.llmarinerBaseUrl.description:
The LLMariner API endpoint.
This URL is used to send a chat completion request

helm-values.modelId.description: The modle ID used for chat completion.

helm-values.nameOverride.description: Override the "slackbot-server.name" value, which is used to annotate some of the resources that are created by this Chart (using "app.kubernetes.io/name").

helm-values.nodeSelector.description: The nodeSelector on Pods tells Kubernetes to schedule Pods on the nodes with matching labels. For more information, see [Assigning Pods to Nodes](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/scheduling-eviction/assign-pod-node/).

helm-values.podAnnotations.description: Optional additional annotations to add to the Deployment Pods.

helm-values.podSecurityContext.description:
Security Context for the slackbot-server pod.
For more information, see [Configure a Security Context for a Pod or Container](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/security-context/).

helm-values.replicaCount.description: The number of replicas for the slackbot-server Deployment.

helm-values.resources.description:
Resources to provide to the slackbot-server pod.
For more information, see [Resource Management for Pods and Containers](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/manage-resources-Containers/).

For example:
requests:
  cpu: 10m
  memory: 32Mi

helm-values.securityContext.description: Security Context for the slackbot-server container. For more information, see [Configure a Security Context for a Pod or Container](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/security-context/).

helm-values.slackAppTokenSecret.key.description: The key name where the app token is stored.

helm-values.slackTokenSecret.key.description: The key name where the token is stored.

helm-values.tolerations.description:
A list of Kubernetes Tolerations, if required.
For more information, see [Taints and Tolerations](https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/scheduling-eviction/taint-and-toleration/).

For example:
tolerations:
- key: foo.bar.com/role
  operator: Equal
  value: master
  effect: NoSchedule

helm-values.version.description: Override the container image tag to deploy by setting this variable. If no value is set, the chart's appVersion will be used.

helm-values.volumeMounts.description: Additional volume mounts to add to the slackbot-server container.

helm-values.volumes.description: Additional volumes to add to the slackbot-server pod.
